metadata.name: Suspicious Service Binary Directory
metadata.comment: Detects a service binary running in a suspicious directory

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\users\\\\public\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\$recycle.bin')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\users\\\\all users\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\users\\\\default\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\users\\\\contacts\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\users\\\\searches\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\perflogs\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\config\\\\systemprofile\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\windows\\\\fonts\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\windows\\\\ime\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\windows\\\\addins\\\\'))) AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\services.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\svchost.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects a service binary running in a suspicious directory
